desc: Organic bamboo and plant based pads. FREE SHIPPING when you spend over $44. Ultra dry, ultra thin and very comfortable. Biodegradable and compostable. Plastic free periods. Affordable, effective & eco-friendly. Australian owned. Subscribe to our automatic deliveries and save 10%.

layout.text: Organic bamboo period pads. Compostable & biodegradable including packaging. Ultra thin, dry and comfortable.
